panels.title: Packet Drops in Kernel (Agent Can't Process)

targets.query: SELECT sum("value")  / 60 FROM "trident_dedup_missed" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host" fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "trident_second_quadruple_generator_window_latency" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "trident_minute_quadruple_generator_latency" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") /60 FROM "trident_minute_quadruple_generator_drop_before_window" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") /60 FROM "trident_minute_collector_drop_before_window" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") /60 FROM "trident_minute_collector_drop_before_window" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") /60 FROM "trident_minute_collector_out" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") /60 FROM "trident_flow_aggr_out" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "index" fill(null)
